thread.title_full: Jurgen Klopp's 500 days at Liverpool | Daily Mail Online

author: Sam Morshead For Mailonline
title: Jurgen Klopp's 500 days at Liverpool | Daily Mail Online
text: Jurgen Klopp's 500 days at Liverpool: He's changed players' diets, forged a relationship with fans and started to make the squad his own but how good has the German's reign actually been? Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp has been at the club for 500 days He has reached two cup finals and changed the way the Reds approach a game The German has focused on the importance of sports science behind the scenes His team have become a fierce attacking unit but struggle defensively He has been afforded room for failure by the media and supporters
